Zoom - Class in com.bitfire.postprocessing.filters
 
Zoom() - Constructor for class com.bitfire.postprocessing.filters.Zoom
 
Zoom.Param - Enum in com.bitfire.postprocessing.filters
 
Zoomer - Class in com.bitfire.postprocessing.effects
Implements a zooming effect: either a radial blur filter or a zoom filter is used.
Zoomer(int, int, RadialBlur.Quality) - Constructor for class com.bitfire.postprocessing.effects.Zoomer
Creating a Zoomer specifying the radial blur quality will enable radial blur
Zoomer(int, int) - Constructor for class com.bitfire.postprocessing.effects.Zoomer
Creating a Zoomer without any parameter will use plain simple zooming
